name: Psycho Princess: The Labyrinth
description:
Princess Hark, daughter of Queen Tress of Dragon Valley and heir to the throne. One problem: Hark doesn't want to wait. For her rebellion, Hark is banished to the Labyrinth below the castle where she must absorb the energies from the Power Crystals that litter the dungeon to regain her abilities.

However, Hark also has narcolepsy, so don't expect to get much time on each level of the Labyrinth to gather these Crystals. There may be someone responsible for this condition that Hark will confront before game's end....

Arrows move, Space or Enter selects. Thanks for playing!
